TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IComponentDesignerStateService

summary.span: 允许设计器存储和检索其状态。

span.span: Allows a designer to store and retrieve its state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设计器的状态是由设计器与之关联的组件进行键控。Designer state is keyed by the component with which the designer is associated. Web 窗体设计曲面提供此服务和组件设计器都使用该服务。The Web Forms design surface offers this service and component designers use the service. 这是一个可选的主机服务，并且控件设计器不应假定将始终提供它。This is an optional host service, and control designers should not assume it will always be provided. 设计器的状态表示为一组名称/值对，在字典中的窗体中。Designer state is represented as a set of name/value pairs, in the form of a dictionary. 字典中存储的值必须是可序列化。Values stored in the dictionary must be serializable. 指定的组件应被放置在设计器中，并且必须具有非空名称。The specified component should be sited in the designer and should have a non-empty name. > [!CAUTION] > 不会存储敏感信息到。Do not store sensitive information to the . 敏感信息包括密码和身份验证数据或你不想要公开到不需要源任何数据。Sensitive information includes password and authentication data, or any data you do not want to expose to an unwanted source.
